statements: SELECT * FROM restoration_projects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM restoration_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM restoration_projects WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM restoration_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM restoration_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM restoration_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM restoration_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date, budget FROM restoration_projects WHERE budget > 5000.00 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM restoration_projects WHERE budget BETWEEN 1000.00 AND 5000.00 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM restoration_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%river%' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM restoration_projects WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM restoration_projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM restoration_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, count(participant_id) as total_participants FROM project_participants GROUP BY project_id HAVING count(participant_id) > 5;
SELECT participant_name, role FROM project_participants WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM restoration_projects WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM restoration_projects WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM restoration_projects WHERE budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY budget DESC, start_date ASC

SELECT project_id, project_name, project_participants.participant_name, project_participants.role FROM restoration_projects JOIN project_participants ON restoration_projects.project_id = project_participants.project_id ORDER BY project_name ASC, project_participants.role DESC

SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM restoration_projects LEFT JOIN project_participants ON restoration_projects.project_id = project_participants.project_id GROUP BY project_id, project_name ORDER BY total_participants DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM restoration_projects;
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE task_budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM restoration_projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT member_name, role FROM project_members WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, task_start_date, task_end_date, task_budget FROM project_tasks ORDER BY task_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM restoration_projects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM restoration_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_budget FROM restoration_projects JOIN project_tasks ON restoration_projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id;
SELECT project_name, member_name, role FROM restoration_projects JOIN project_members ON restoration_projects.project_id = project_members.project_id WHERE role = 'Engineer';
SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(*) as num_tasks FROM restoration_projects JOIN project_tasks ON restoration_projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_id, project_name;
SELECT * FROM RestorationProjects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM RestorationProjects ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM RestorationProjects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, project_id FROM RestorationProjects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_id, COUNT(material_id) AS total_materials FROM MaterialsUsed GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM RestorationProjects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM RestorationProjects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, task_description FROM RestorationProjects JOIN ProjectTasks ON RestorationProjects.project_id = ProjectTasks.project_id;
SELECT project_name, member_name, role FROM RestorationProjects JOIN ProjectMembers ON RestorationProjects.project_id = ProjectMembers.project_id;
SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity FROM RestorationProjects JOIN MaterialsUsed ON RestorationProjects.project_id = MaterialsUsed.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Restoration_Projects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM Restoration_Projects ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM Project_Team WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM Project_Tasks WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT assignment_date, assignment_status FROM Task_Assignments WHERE team_id = 4 ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Restoration_Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Restoration_Projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_member_count FROM Project_Team ORDER BY team_member_count DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Project_Tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';

SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM Restoration_Projects JOIN Budget_Expenses ON Restoration_Projects.project_id = Budget_Expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_expenses > 5000;
